data.title: Robin Rile, Author at ROBIN RILE FINE ART
data.text:
Diego Velazquez: The Original Trendsetter: How a Golden Age Painter Influenced 20th Century’s Greatest Artistic Minds like Picasso and Dali.

A child’s guide to the Fundació Joan Miró in Barcelona, with Robin Rile Fine Art.

Café Els Quatre Gats inspired creatives in Barcelona in the early 20th Century, including Picasso. We explore how it continues to inspire a new generation of artists and creatives.

By Kat Barrow-Horth, for Robin Rile Fine Art A short distance from the whitewashed town of Cadaques on Spain’s Costa Brava, a staggered house sits perched above an unassuming bay known as Port Llligat. The home, initially a fishing hut, belonged to artist Salvador Dali & his wife, Gala. The two purchased the hut & …

Casa Dali: The Unsurreal Life of a Surrealist Artist Read More »

By Kat Barrow-Horth, for Robin Rile Fine Art The dusty hillside town of Vilamarxant, Spain has a small, somewhat hidden dirt road weaving through an old grove of twisted olive trees. It is an unassuming landscape, unmistakably Spanish and dotted with simple dwellings stacked amongst arid terrain. As the road winds beneath a canopy of …

A Tuesday Afternoon With Pepe Read More »

What kind of a person makes a museum…for himself? The consummate showboat and entertainer, Salvador Dali, of course.

When Art Historians visit an ancient city, they don’t just seek out the old, but work to find the new in order to inspire the next generation. Robin Rile Fine Art shows their son new art in Barcelona, Spain 2022.

Peter Anton (American, b.1963) is a renowned sculptor and artist who was born in New Haven, CT. He mainly focuses on food, especially on chocolates and other kinds of sweets. He makes giant naturalistic sculptures, and is famous for his boxed chocolates. Occasionally, his studio can appear like a sweet shop, as it is filled with …

Peter Anton’s Sweet Tooth Read More »

Comic Kids is founded by Reed Horth and Kat Barrow-Horth of Miami’s Robin Rile Fine Art. Artnet Gallery Network, March 14, 2022 In 2008, husband-and-wife art dealers Reed Horth and Kat Barrow-Horth established Robin Rile Fine Art in Miami, selling works by world-class artists such as Salvador Dalí, Robert Indiana, and Joan Miró. After a decade establishing themselves …

ARTNET: How Husband-and-Wife Gallerists Started a Nonprofit That Uses Comics (and Dalí) to Teach Art to Underserved Kids Read More »

The Empresses is a series of five glorious prints depicting carefully composed images of butterflies by Damien Hirst and published by HENI. The striking Empresses prints are constructed of beautiful images of red butterfly wings, which are intricately arranged with a filigree of red glitter to produce visually intoxicating kaleidoscope-like effects. The prints are named after five …

Coming Soon: Damien Hirst’s “Empresses” Read More »
